## AnswersRequest.additionalHttpHeaderValues property

AdditionalHttpHeaderValues allows users to specify additional values for specific HTTP headers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
additionalHttpHeaderValues?: AdditionalHttpHeaderValues;
```
